channel.title: Posts on NLP Club
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on NLP Club

item.title: 10 March 2023: GPT factual knowledge editing
item.description: Friday, 10 March 2023, 15:00 ELTE Lágymányos Campus, Northern Building (Pázmány Péter sétány 1/A), room 7.88 Papers Meng, Kevin, David Bau, Alex Andonian, and Yonatan Belinkov. 2022. “Locating and Editing Factual Knowledge in GPT.” Arxiv Preprint Arxiv:2202.05262. https://arxiv.org/pdf/2202.05262.pdf.

item.title: 14 April 2023: Training instruction-following models: RL from human feedback and Self-instruct
item.description: Friday, 14 April 2023, 15:00 ELTE Lágymányos Campus, Northern Building (Pázmány Péter sétány 1/A), room 7.88 Papers Taori, Rohan, Ishaan Gulrajani, Tianyi Zhang, Yann Dubois, Xuechen Li, Carlos Guestrin, Percy Liang, and Tatsunori B. Hashimoto. 2023. “Stanford Alpaca: An Instruction-Following Llama Model.” https://crfm.stanford.edu/2023/03/13/alpaca.html. Ouyang, Long, Jeff Wu, Xu Jiang, Diogo Almeida, Carroll L Wainwright, Pamela Mishkin, Chong Zhang, et al. 2022. “Training Language Models to Follow Instructions with Human Feedback.” Arxiv Preprint Arxiv:2203.
